FIGHTC.original: If the crowd sides with you, in can help out in a tight spot.
FIGHTC.translated: 如果观众站在你这边，他们或许能在关键时刻帮到你。

FIGHTC.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ to compete ~r~-$100~s~.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to spectate.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit.
~s~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ to compete. ~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to spectate ~r~-$50~s~.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit.
~s~Well done. You are the L.C. Cage Fighter champion.
FIGHTC.translated: ~s~干得漂亮。你已称霸自由城铁笼格斗。

FIGHTC.original: ~s~Bet costs ~r~$~1~.~s~~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to back the right fighter ~g~+$~1~.~s~~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ to back the left fighter ~g~+$~1~.~s~
FIGHTC.translated: ~s~下注 ~r~$~1~~n~~s~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~押注右边的选手 ~g~+$~1~~n~~s~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~押注左边的选手 ~g~+$~1~~s~

FIGHTC.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_KB_RIGHT~ to back the right fighter.~s~~n~Press ~INPUT_KB_LEFT~ to back the left fighter.~s~
FIGHTC.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_KB_RIGHT~押注右边的选手~s~~n~按~INPUT_KB_LEFT~押注左边的选手~s~

FIGHTC.original: Try showboating by pressing ~INPUT_ZOOM_RADAR~ or perform counters.
FIGHTC.translated: 按~INPUT_ZOOM_RADAR~嘲讽对手，或进行反击。

FIGHTC.original: ~s~Use ~PAD_LSTICK_UPDOWN~ to adjust your bet.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~ to place bet.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit.
~s~Use ~INPUT_FRONTEND_AXIS_Y~ to adjust your bet.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~ to place bet.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit.
Try showboating by pressing ~INPUT_COVER~ or perform counters.
FIGHTC.translated: 按~INPUT_COVER~嘲讽对手，或进行反击。

FIGHTC.original: FIGHT CLUB ~n~ ~n~ There are 7 ranks increasing in difficulty.
FIGHTC.translated: FIGHT CLUB ~n~ ~n~ 难度增加7个等级。

FIGHTC.original: ~r~You are disqualified for leaving the ring.
The fight is over, you are through to the next round.
~s~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~ to continue fighting.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to spectate ~r~-$50.~s~~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit.
FIGHTC.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~进入下一轮~n~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~旁观 ~r~-$50~n~~s~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出

FIGHTC.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to back the right fighter.~s~~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ to back the left fighter.~s~
FIGHTC.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~押注右边的选手~s~~n~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~押注左边的选手~s~

FIGHTC.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to continue.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit.~n~If you quit you will lose your entrance fee.
FIGHTC.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_SPRINT~继续。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。~n~若退出，则将失去已交的入场费。

FIGHTC.original: ~s~PLACEHOLDER: Cutscene showing the rewards the player gets~n~for being L.C. Fighters champion. ~n~Currently $4000.
FIGHTC.translated: ~s~PLACEHOLDER: Cutscene showing the rewards the player gets~n~for being L.C. Fighters champion. ~n~Currently $4000.

FIGHTC.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ to compete ~r~-$100~s~.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to spectate ~r~-$50~s~.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit.
~s~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ to compete.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to spectate.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit.
